nodes.text: Tag Raynor was a male Clog-dweller. He offered to sell the Black Sphere to a group of bounty hunters by arranging a meet in the Gold Plaza. He was however an employee of Hahz Fallone and was merely setting them up so Jorga Sune would try and get the artifact which was a fake. During the exchange he was killed by Falad Prok who shot him with a poison dart pistol.
